titleStmt.title: Belgian parliamentary corpus ParlaMint-BE [ParlaMint]
Belgisch parlementair corpus ParlaMint-BE [ParlaMint]
Belgian Federal Parliament: Plenary sessions and committee meetings (2015-2020)
Belgisch Federaal Parlement: Plenaire zittingen en commissievergaderingen (2015-2020)

respStmt.resp: Data retrieval and conversion to TEI

availability.p: Deze bestanden zijn beschikbaar volgens de Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International License
This work is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International License

bibl.title: Federaal Parlement van België: Plenaire zittingen
Belgian Federal Parliament: Plenary sessions

projectDesc.p: ParlaMint is een project dat tot doel heeft (1) een meertalige reeks vergelijkbare corpora van parlementaire handelingen te creëren die uniform zijn gecodeerd volgens de Parla-CLARIN aanbevelingen en die zowel de COVID-19 pandemie vanaf november 2019 als de eerdere periode vanaf 2015 bestrijkt om als referentiecorpus te dienen; (2) de corpora taalkundig te verrijken met syntactische structuren volgens de Universal Dependenciesrichtlijnen, en annotatie van named entities toe te voegen; (3) de corpora beschikbaar te maken via concordancers en Parlameter; en (4) use cases in politieke wetenschappen en digitale geesteswetenschappen te bouwen op basis van de corpusgegevens.

ParlaMint is a project that aims to (1) create a multilingual set of comparable corpora of parliamentary proceedings uniformly encoded according to the Parla-CLARIN recommendations and covering the COVID-19 pandemic from November 2019 as well as the earlier period from 2015 to serve as a reference corpus; (2) process the corpora linguistically to add Universal Dependencies syntactic structures and Named Entity annotation; (3) make the corpora available through concordancers and Parlameter; and (4) build use cases in Political Sciences and Digital Humanities based on the corpus data.

correction.p: No correction of source texts was performed.

normalization.p: Text has not been normalised, except for spacing.

hyphenation.p: Hyphenation has not been altered with respect to the source files.

quotation.p: Quotation marks have been left in the text and are not explicitly marked up.

segmentation.p: The texts are segmented into utterances (speeches) and segments (corresponding to paragraphs in the source transcription).
Non-speaker text (voting results, ...) has been left out

category.catDesc: Gemeenschap (Vlaams of Waals)
Community (Flemish or Wallonian)
Chairperson : chairman of a meeting
Regular : a regular speaker at a meeting
Guest : a guest speaker at a meeting
Reporting : a reporting speaker at a meeting
